title: EU Nations Back 15% Gas-Cut Target as Russia Set to Reduce Flows
content:
1. EU Nations Back 15% Gas-Cut Target as Russia Set to Reduce Flows  Bloomberg
  2. Europe Agrees to Cut Gas Consumption as Russia Crimps Supplies  The Wall Street Journal
  3. Europe agrees compromise gas curbs as Russia squeezes supply  Reuters
  4. Europe dials down its plans to ration gas this winter  CNN
  5. E.U. emergency plan over Russian gas adds exemptions in face of resistance  The Washington Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: EU諸国、15％のガス削減目標を支持 ロシアが流量を削減へ
欧盟国家支持15%的天然气削减目标，因为俄罗斯将减少流量
歐盟國家支持15%的天然氣削減目標，因爲俄羅斯將減少流量
